alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Southeast Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 3:06PM MST until January 08 at 4:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Northern Dona Ana County and Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley. In Texas, Western El Paso County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and outdoor decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds combined with light snow tonight may create areas of lower visibility. These strong winds and much cooler temperatures will also make for dangerous wind chills tonight into Tuesday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Otero Mesa; Southeast Tularosa Basin; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands
